recipesJson.name: Ckemist Original: White Wedding
recipesJson.author: Ckemist
recipesJson.description:
A delicious white cake with a thick layer of creamy vanilla icing, with a hint of cinnamon. 
Sweet and tasty mix. 

No need for sweetener, it is decadant as is.

reviews.text: I enjoyed this recipe. The only thing I would lowered is the INW Creme Brulee because is giving me a lot of the burnt note. Nice addition of the Yellow Cake by CAP.
I love how the cinnamon comes and goes just like a cinnamon swirl through a baked cake. A good mix and every flavor is definitely a must have.
